title: iNaiyE illAda
sahitya:
iNaiyE illAda tuNaiyAvAn murugan aNaindaruL purindu aDiyAriDam pOkka


anupallavi

  kaNa nEram avanai karudi vaNanginAl kanindu vandu udava manam uvandiDuvAn


caraNam    tolvinaiyAl viLaindu toDarum allalgaL ellAm eLLaLavum nillAmal nIkkuvAn
nal vAzhvu eidavum nAnila mIduyyavum nADiyadarkkOr vaghai tEDi vADuvOrkku
